ActJudges Act
SubjectPhilomena Stratton ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Joseph John Stratton **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to PHILOMENA STRATTON, survivor of the Hon. Joseph John Stratton, a Judge of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, effective November 9, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
